items.quote: I got interviews within a week after the rewrite.

items.author: Faith A.

pageTestimonials.headline: From 3 months of silence to 3 interviews in 2 weeks
pageTestimonials.quote: After updating my CV and LinkedIn profile with CVWriting.co.ke, I started getting interview invitations within two weeks. The new CV finally reflected the roles I was targeting.
pageTestimonials.name: Grace M.

pageTestimonials.headline: Promotion to Senior Officer within one review cycle
pageTestimonials.quote: The CV and cover letter rework helped me clearly show my impact over the last three years. It made the promotion conversation much easier.
pageTestimonials.name: Daniel K.

pageTestimonials.headline: Breaking into a new industry after a career switch
pageTestimonials.quote: I was moving from customer service into a tech support role. The CVWriting.co.ke team reframed my experience in a way that clicked with recruiters.
pageTestimonials.name: S. A.

pageTestimonials.headline: Landing an international role with a sharper senior CV
pageTestimonials.quote: I had strong experience but my CV still read like a local role. The rewrite positioned me as a regional expert and helped me secure an offer with an international company.
pageTestimonials.name: Martin L.

pageTestimonials.headline: First job offer within a month of graduation
pageTestimonials.quote: As a fresh graduate I didn’t know how to turn my projects and internships into a convincing CV. The team organised everything clearly and I got my first offer in under a month.
pageTestimonials.name: Joyce N.

pageTestimonials.headline: Board-ready profile for executive opportunities
pageTestimonials.quote: They helped me condense 15+ years into a crisp, strategic CV that speaks to boards and investors, not just HR. The new profile has already opened higher-level conversations.
pageTestimonials.name: P. K.

pageTestimonials.headline: Confident return to work after a career break
pageTestimonials.quote: After a long break I worried my CV would be ignored. CVWriting.co.ke framed my break honestly but focused on skills and impact. I received multiple callbacks within a few weeks.
pageTestimonials.name: Linda A.

pageTestimonials.headline: Clear public sector achievements led to promotion
pageTestimonials.quote: Public sector work is hard to quantify, but they helped me highlight measurable outcomes and leadership contributions. This was a key document in my successful promotion.
pageTestimonials.name: George O.
